text: @holly_cummins This is a great blog. I'm actually doing my final year CS project on an app for promoting sustainable fashion. In my 1st presentation, trying to explain why we should care about fashion to three middle aged male lecturers was an uphill battle. But it worked and it was different

author.name: Caoimhe Tiernan
author.description: Here lies Caoimhe. Was she pecked to death by swans or computer code? Who can say? (She/her)
